parse_markers.error: No DocBlock was found for File Action/Resize/Proportional.php
No DocBlock was found for Method getShellCommand

docblock.description: Proportional resize of images.
docblock.long-description: if height = 0 the resize is based on the new width if width = 0 the resize is based on the new height if width and height > 0 image magick will try to match both measurements while keeping the aspect ratio so the final image might not have the exact dimentions requested but the closest dimentions possible
